segment.source: Security Options (Windows 10)
segment.target: Security Options (Windows 10)

segment.source: Provides an introduction to the settings under Security Options of the local security policies and links to information about each setting.
segment.target: Provides an introduction to the settings under Security Options of the local security policies and links to information about each setting.

segment.source: Security Options
segment.target: Security Options

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Provides an introduction to the settings under Security Options of the local security policies and links to information about each setting.
segment.target: Provides an introduction to the settings under Security Options of the local security policies and links to information about each setting.

segment.source: The Security Options contain the following groupings of security policy settings that allow you to configure the behavior of the local computer.
segment.target: The Security Options contain the following groupings of security policy settings that allow you to configure the behavior of the local computer.

segment.source: Some of these policies can be included in a Group Policy Object and distributed over your organization.
segment.target: Some of these policies can be included in a Group Policy Object and distributed over your organization.

segment.source: If you edit policy settings locally on a device, you will affect the settings on only that one device.
segment.target: If you edit policy settings locally on a device, you will affect the settings on only that one device.

segment.source: If you configure the settings in a Group Policy Object (GPO), the settings apply to all devices that are subject to that GPO.
segment.target: If you configure the settings in a Group Policy Object (GPO), the settings apply to all devices that are subject to that GPO.

segment.source: For info about setting security policies, see Configure security policy settings.
segment.target: For info about setting security policies, see Configure security policy settings.

segment.source: In this section
segment.target: In this section

segment.target: Topic

segment.target: Description
